alert.note: Alert for Eureka (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 2:12PM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nevada and northeast Nevada, including the following counties, in north central Nevada, Eureka. In northeast Nevada, Elko. * WHEN...Until 200 PM PDT Tuesday Apr 18. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is or occurring. SR-278 was destroyed due to flood waters and is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 212 PM PDT, rapid snowmelt is causing flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... SR-278, Pine Valley, and Palisade. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not bypass road closures or barriers as SR-278 is destroyed due to flooding.
